EMAIL_INVALID: Email must be a valid email address
PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: Password must be at least 6 characters long

EMAIL_VERIFICATION_REQUIRED: Please verify your email before signing in. Check your email for verification code.
ACCOUNT_DEACTIVATED: Your account is deactivated. Please contact support.
PASSWORD_RESET_EMAIL_SENT: If the email exists, a password reset link has been sent.
OTP_VERIFIED_SUCCESS: OTP verified successfully. You can now reset your password.

CATEGORY_SORT_ORDER_INVALID: Category sort order must be a number
CATEGORY_PARENT_ID_INVALID: Category parent ID must be a number

PLACE_LATITUDE_INVALID: Place latitude must be a valid latitude value
PLACE_LONGITUDE_INVALID: Place longitude must be a valid longitude value

PLACE_CATEGORY_INVALID: Place category must be a number
PLACE_COVER_IMAGE_INVALID: Place cover image must be a string
PLACE_COVER_IMAGE_MAX_LENGTH: Place cover image cannot exceed 500 characters
PLACE_IMAGES_INVALID: Place images must be an array of strings
PLACE_IS_ACTIVE_INVALID: Place active status must be a boolean
PLACE_SLUG_INVALID: Place slug must be a string
PLACE_TAGS_INVALID: Place tags must be a string
PLACE_COUNTRY_ID_INVALID: Country ID must be a number
PLACE_STATE_ID_INVALID: State ID must be a number
PLACE_CITY_ID_INVALID: City ID must be a number
PLACE_COUNTRY_INVALID_TYPE: Country ID does not reference a valid country
PLACE_STATE_INVALID_TYPE: State ID does not reference a valid state
PLACE_CITY_INVALID_TYPE: City ID does not reference a valid city
PLACE_STATE_COUNTRY_MISMATCH: State does not belong to the specified country
PLACE_CITY_STATE_MISMATCH: City does not belong to the specified state
PLACE_COUNTRY_REQUIRED_FOR_STATE: Country ID is required when state ID is provided
PLACE_STATE_REQUIRED_FOR_CITY: State ID is required when city ID is provided
PLACE_NOT_OWNER: You are not the owner of this place
USER_FULL_NAME_INVALID: Full name must be a string

USER_WEBSITE_INVALID: Website must be a valid URL
LOCATION_TYPE_INVALID: Location type must be one of: country, state, city
LOCATION_PARENT_ID_INVALID: Parent ID must be a number
TAG_NAME_INVALID: Tag name must be a string
TAG_NAME_MIN_LENGTH: Tag name must be at least 2 characters
TAG_SLUG_INVALID: Tag slug must be a string
TAG_DESCRIPTION_INVALID: Tag description must be a string
TAG_COLOR_INVALID: Tag color must be a string
TAG_IS_ACTIVE_INVALID: Tag active status must be a boolean
TAG_ALREADY_EXISTS: Tag with this name or slug already exists
PLACE_TAG_IDS_INVALID: Place tag IDs must be an array
PLACE_TAG_ID_INVALID: Each place tag ID must be a number
FILE_FOLDER_INVALID: File folder must be a string
FILE_NAME_INVALID: File name must be a string

FILE_SIZE_MIN: File size must be at least 0
